text: “læa meux mu sa di ma tam kahnd wela khxng rea læa phracea khxng khea di tras kæ khea khea di klaw khun wa xo phracea khxng kha phraxngkh pord hı kha phraxngkh hen dwy theid doythi kha phraxngkh ca di mxng du phraxngkh phraxngkh tras wa cea ca hen kha mi di penxankhad tæthwa cea cng mxng du phukhea nan theid tha hak man man xyu n thi khxng man cea k ca hen kha khran meux phracea khxng khea di pracaksʹ thi phukhea nan k thahı man thlay taw lng xyang rabreiyb læa mu sa k lm lng nı sphaph hmd sti khran meux khea fun khun khea k klaw wa mha brisuththi phraxngkh than kha phraxngkh khx lukæthosʹ tx phraxngkh læa kha phraxngkh nan khux khn ræk nı hmu phu sraththa thanghlay”
